io.hekate.spring.boot.codec

Class HekateKryoCodecConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.hekate.spring.boot.codec.HekateKryoCodecConfigurer

  • @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnHekateEnabled
 @ConditionalOnProperty(name="hekate.codec",
                       havingValue="kryo")
public class HekateKryoCodecConfigurer
extends Object
    Auto-configuration for KryoCodecFactory.

    Module dependency

    Kryo integration requires 'com.esotericsoftware:kryo-shaded' to be on the project's classpath.

    Configuration

    This auto-configuration can be enabled by setting the 'hekate.codec' property to 'kryo' in the application's configuration.

    The following properties can be used to customize the auto-configured KryoCodecFactory instance:

    • 'hekate.codec.kryo.known-types'
    • 'hekate.codec.kryo.unsafe-io'
    • 'hekate.codec.kryo.references'
